mapper.insert: insert into pet(pet_id, knd, name, gen, age, wgt, oper,memo,file_no, client_id, species) values(pet_seq.nextval, #{knd},#{name},#{gen}, #{age}, #{wgt}, #{oper}, #{memo}, 0, #{client_id}, #{species})
mapper.update: update pet set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, wgt=#{wgt}, oper=#{oper}, memo=#{memo}, where pet_name =#{pet_name} and client_id=#{client_id}
